name: Bohol: Island Adventure
description:
Time to relax and experience one of the Island in the Philippines. Bohol is the home of the smallest primate, the tarsier. It is also famous with its chocolate hills and many legendary mountains. Have fun cruising at Loboc River with serenade and a delightful meal. Take a look at a portion of the Philippine history and fall in love with the tropical beauty of Bohol. 

*Pls. take note that Bohol is far from Manila so the travelling time may take too long. For those who wants to avail for this tour, may check-in at a hotel in Cebu City for your own convenience.
